Front End¶

Below are the functions and test functions used to make the front end part of the website

analyze_text_color(text, genre, metric)¶

Analyze the given text that needs to be analyzed

Parameters

  • text (str) – scalar depicting the text that needs to be analyzed

  • genre (str) – scalar depicting the genre of the content: “cooking”, “gaming”, “influencers”

  • metric (str) – scalar depicting the metric to base the analysis on: “likes_mean”, “likes_median”, “dislikes_mean”, “dislikes_median”, “views_mean”, “views_median”, “polarity”, “subjectivity”

Returns

analysis - a list with same number of elements as number of words in given text, with each corresponding element being the color for that word: “red” means bad, “yellow” means okay, “green” means good and “white” means “Not found” (in database)

Return type

list

wordscloud(x, Genre)¶

This function is to plot graph for the first section: Cloud Map Over Time

Parameters

  • x – input time

  • Genre – different topics

P_N_cloud(x, Genre)¶

This function is to plot graph for section II: Like and Dislike words over time

Parameters

  • x – input time

  • Genre – different topics like: positive or negative results

color_changer(x, Genre, Metric)¶

Change the color of inputed text instantly

Parameters

  • x (str) – scalar depicting the text that needs to be analyzed

  • Genre (str) – scalar depicting the genre of the content: “cooking”, “gaming”, “influencers”

  • Metric (str) – scalar depicting the metric to base the analysis on : “likes_mean”, “likes_median”, “dislikes_mean”, “dislikes_median”, “views_mean”, “views_median”, “polarity”, “subjectivity”
